title: Carrot 800g
description: Carrots are firm and crisp. The skin is mostly smooth, but it may have wrinkles that go from side to side. Carrots grow where the temperature is cool to warm. They grow best in soil that is loose.

title: Potatoes 1kg
description: A potato contains a lot of starch and other carbohydrates. Potato usually has a light-brown or yellowish skin and is white or yellow inside. If the potato gets light on it, the tuber turns green and will be poisonous.

title: Green Grapes 2kg
description: A grape is a fruit, botanically a berry, of the deciduous woody vines of the flowering plant genus Vitis. Grapes can be eaten fresh as table grapes, used for making wine, jam, grape juice, jelly,...

title: Pine apple 300g
description: The papaya, papaw, or pawpaw is the plant Carica papaya, one of the 22 accepted species in the genus Carica of the family Caricaceae.
